bibl.title: Some Remarks on the Orthography of the "Ptolemaic Hymns" of P. Lit. Goodspeed 2.
Proceedings of the 24th International Congress of Papyrology, Helsinki, 1-7 August, 2004. Volume I
bibl.author: BARBANTANI, Silvia

bibl.note: P. lit. Goodspeed 2 (= Pack2 1620). - 1. The papyrus and its content. - 2. Orthographic peculiarities. - 3. Possible explanations. - Bibliography.
BARBANTANI Silvia, Some Remarks on the Orthography of the "Ptolemaic Hymns" of P. Lit. Goodspeed 2.

Jaakko FRÖSÉN, Tiina PUROLA and Erja SALMENKIVI (Edd.), Proceedings of the 24th International Congress of Papyrology, Helsinki, 1-7 August, 2004. Volume I = Commentationes Humanarum Litterarum. 122, 1, 2007 (Helsinki, 2007) pp. 83-92.
